wikipedia_page.main: Henry Benjamin Pyrgos (born 9 July 1989) is a Scotland international rugby union player whose regular playing position is scrum-half. He currently plays for Edinburgh Rugby of the Pro14. He previously played for Glasgow Warriors, where he won 147 caps, captained the side, and won the Pro12 in 2014-15.

response: * Henry Pyrgos (born 1989), Scottish International rugby player, was born in the town.

* Henry Pyrgos, Scottish international rugby player
